title: Moskollo FM08 DB Updated to 10/9/8
description:
My Player Database for FM08. It&#039;s updated to include transfers upto and including 11/9/8, the last thing I added was Zola taking over West Ham.

It should be quicker to download than my other files, but though I have done as many transfers as I can, I am not the Rothmans Football Yearbook 2008!

If you like this please check out my other downloads for player pictures and background screens for FM08, which are for your serious Champ addicts, they take  longer to download though!

The original folder was taken from the 8.02 update and I have changed and amended since the January transfer window. You need to update your FM08 with 8.02 exe for this to work, you can get this from here:
   <a href="
http://www.sigames.com/news.php?type=view&article_id=1297" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.sigames.com/news.php?type=view&article_id=1297</a>

Put this folder in your &#039;my documents/sports interactive/database&#039; folder and then when starting a new game select moskollo db.

Let me know if you have any problems with this file by leaving a comment, positive comments will be cool as well...

Peace and long live torrent,




Moskollo
